messages.message:
+1 ^, thank you everyone for your contributions! our median failure rate over the past week has been 3% :tada: :blob_excited: :couscous:

as you can see, there wasn't much to do as cypress on-call this week :sweat_smile:

we do have some consistently failing tests on aihub-sandbox (~7% of tests) and aihub-uat (~5% of tests)

• `Billing/payment.spec.ts` fails bc of Metronome API error
• for `ViewApp/app-billing.spec.ts` we need to change the button selector to look for `Run` not `Run app` :loading: 
• `search-app.spec.ts` is failing bc Search is no longer shown on the home page
• `upstream-integrations` seems to be failing bc of an Azure credential expiring?
• for `converse-app.spec.ts`, digitization takes too long
• `view-home-page` is failing on aihub-uat bc this fix (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/commit/95fe88311d350a7e96dc8891731fb74ca989dae4#diff-29f0085de74c1ef3830fb9d379104dda303441a699089b94b7d2f12d3e085bd5R42) wasn't backported
    ◦ nbd since we're going to start UAT for 25.18 soon anyways

> • `search-app.spec.ts` is failing bc Search is no longer shown on the home page
@Weiming Wu do you know when we stopped showing Search on the home page?
There shouldn't be any code changes that made it stop showing up

ah i think it's because `index_freq` is set to `OFF` on all our data sources (see response for `/api/v2/mounts/list`, which is used in `useShowSearch`)

@Balaram should we turn off the `search-app` Cypress test if there are no searchable data sources on aihub-sandbox or aihub-uat?
In our recent releases, we wiped the mount table and remounted certain data sources, so probably that's why indexing is all off now.
